esqlQuery.esql:
FROM metrics-elastic_agent.*beat-default*
| WHERE data_stream.dataset LIKE "elastic_agent.*beat"
| STATS 
    max_errors = MAX(TO_LONG(beat.stats.libbeat.output.write.errors)),
    min_errors = MIN(TO_LONG(beat.stats.libbeat.output.write.errors))  
    BY time_bucket = DATE_TRUNC(1 minute, @timestamp), elastic_agent.id, component.id
| EVAL errors_count = max_errors - min_errors
| WHERE errors_count > 5
| KEEP errors_count, elastic_agent.id, component.id
